content: * and in the broken dawn and through the quiet of dusk she knit and knit and at last the socks were done polly thomas* this pattern is great for self-striping yarns and scrappy socks combine vibrant variegated minis with a high contrast solid to make bold and beautiful socks a top down sock with heel flap and gusset **sizes** small medium large finished sock circumference unstretched 18 20 5 23 cm / 7 8 9 inches i would recommend picking a size that gives you 1 to 2 5 cm / 0 5 to 1 inch of negative ease model is wearing a medium size with a foot circumference of 22 cm / 8 5 inches leg length worked in sample is 15 cm / 6 inches leg and foot length are fully adjustable **skill level** a basic understanding of sock construction how to work knits purls decreases and yarn overs this pattern has been tested and tech edited
